position.marginalia_text: Argentum viuu[m] coagulatum, Argyrion zotichon, Arsenicum, Auripigmentu[m], Azoch, Cain, Cambar, Caput corvi, caspachaia, Coelum, Chesseph hai, Cor Saturni, Compar, Corpus album, corpus co[n]trarium, Filius, Fumus albus, Gumma, Hermaphroditus, Hyems, Humiditas adustiua, Humiditas aquosa, Inimicus, Lapis vnus, Magnesia, Medicina vna, Medium despositiuum, Menstruum, MERCVRIUS, occidens, Ollus, Ovum, Phlegma, Plu[m]bu[m], primus, Punctum, Radix, Saturnus, Secretu[m] scolia[e], senectus, Serinech, Servus fugitiuus, Socius, Spiritus, stagnum, Sublimatu[m], Succus, Sudor solis, terra residua, Ventus, Vespera, Vrina pueroru[m], Vultur, Zibach, et Ziva, ide[m] significant. &c

marginalia.translation: solid mercury, , arsenic, orpiment, alzoth, , cinnabar, the head of a raven, , the sky, mineralised mercury, the heart of Saturn, Compar, white body , contrary body , son, white smoke, , hermaphrodite, winter, dry humidity , wet humidity, enemy, one stone, magnesium, one medicine, Menstruum , MERCURY, , Ollus , egg , phlegma, lead, , , root, Saturn, , old age , , fleeing servant ,

position.marginalia_text: Natura[e] & Complexiones primaru[m] qualitatu[m], sunt quatuor, [etc.]

marginalia.translation: There are four natures and combinations of the prime qualities.
